name: Check search results contain search query
description: Open Wiki; Enter valid search query in the search field; Check that visible search results contain search query in title

steps.name: Rotate screen to portrait mode. This method doesn't work for mobile web.
Skips welcome page in mobile app. This method doesn't work for mobile web.
Opens start page for mobile web. This method doesn't work for mobile app.
Typing and sending the search query in the search field
Getting search result element defined by its instance number
Checking that search result by its instance number contains search query
